about_the_game:
With over 20,000 objects and 1000 separate animations, it will take you a long time to see everything at this airport. There is all new lighting, airport vehicles running around, new overpasses, trees, airport and road signs, cars, taxiways, buses, vans and limousines on the "city-side" of the terminals.

Animations include: aircraft, cars, fuel trucks, catering trucks, cargo trucks, cargo loaders, cargo trains, forklifts, portable a/c units, mobile stairs, security gates, aircraft, belt-loaders, baggage workers, a couple jetways, lavatory service vehicles and workers, baggage cart trains with drivers, tractors pulling GPU's, aircraft, ticket gates, aircraft maintenance workers, toll booth gates, etc., etc. And, oh yes, did I mention "aircraft"? There are also a few surprises for those in the right place as the right time.

This package also includes Marginal's excellent Safegate Docking System and automated jetways.

KJFK is completely drivable in your favorite ground vehicle. Want to park your car at the 4th level of the Terminal 1 car park? No problem. Just follow the road signs to navigate your way around the airport just as you would in real life. KJFK also has full working ATC with programmed runway flows according to wind direction. Three and a half years and 7000 hours of hard work went into making this KJFK as life-like and fun to visit as possible!


  • Close to 20,000 objects
  • Many animated objects using Ground Traffic (by Marginal)
  • Accurate placement of runways
  • All terminal are modeled
  • Gates - road - parking lots - buildings
  • Many custom starting points
  • Night and day textures
  • Hours and hours of fun

OpenSceneryX must be installed

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or older
  • Processor: Multi Core Processor (CPU): Quad Core 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with at least 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenSceneryX must be installed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.8 or older
  • Processor: Multi Core Processor (CPU): Quad Core 3,0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with at least 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenSceneryX must be installed
